snippet.title: Potato Mash! - Gameplay Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist now!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2296500/Potato_Mash/?utm_source=youtube

Potato Mash! is an upcoming Action-Adventure game where you play the story of the cute Potato and smash everyone using him as your mouse cursor! Coming to Steam® in 2023.

#gameplay #indiegame #trailer
